item.title: AWS Requirements for HA Wireguard Cluster
item.description: Create EC2 Target Group and add both Trustgrid gateways with the target being wireguard server port (Default UDP 51820) The health check should be set to http with a path of /status and override traffic port to be port 80. Only the active member of the Trustgrid Cluster will respond as healthy to the health check. Create NLB (Network Load Balancer) with listener set to configured UDP wireguard server port (Default 51820) and forwarding to the target group created above.

item.title: Configure HA Trustgrid Gateway Cluster in AWS
item.description: Deploy a pair of Trustgrid gateways. Deployment guide includes an example Cloud Formation template that can be used directly or customized for your environment or converted to Terraform if preferred. Gateways can be deployed in the same availability zone or different ones to provide greater redundancy across AWS. Deploy a Trustgrid Node AMI in AWS.
